author: davsclaus
msg: CAMEL-844: BeanLanguage now supports invoking bean that isn't in the regiistry. So you can invoke beans just by the typename (= classname). Also improved the debug/trace logging a bit.

author: adrianc
msg: Simplified Scott's FlexibleStringExpander NPE fix and updated the JavaDocs.
Many thanks to Scott for catching that, and many thanks to David Jones for his suggestions on the refactor.

author: kmenard
msg: Fixed CAY-1095: Cayenne attempts to append precision information to DOUBLE types when creating tables in hsqldb which results in a sql exception.

author: bago
msg: add svn:mime-type to css not having one
